Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • Card
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MemoryCard

    public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a card, it has a suite {'S','H','C','D'}, number {'A','2','3','4','5','6','7','8','9','T','J','Q','K'}, and status (0 = face down, 1 = face up, 2 = matched)
    Author:
    Noah Jaffe 11/09/2017 Noah0m0jaffe@gmail.com

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected char cardNum
      CARDNUM OPTIONS: {'A','2','3','4','5','6','7','8','9','T','J','Q','K'}
      protected char cardSuite
      CARDSUITE OPTIONS: {'S','H','C','D'}
      protected int status
      STATUS: 0 = face down, 1 = face up, 2 = matched

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
        Card(char suite, char num)
      creates a card with default status of 0 (face down)
      protected Card(int stat)
      overloaded constructor only to be used by a subclass

    • Method Detail

      • getColor

        protected char getColor()
        Returns:
        'R' for Red suites 'B' for Black suites 'E' if the card has not been declared yet

      • matches

        public boolean matches(Card card)
        checks to see if this card matches the card given, matching means same number and color
        Parameters:
        card - the card to check for matching
        Returns:
        if this card matches with the card given

      • setNumber

        public void setNumber(char num)
        Parameters:
        num - the card 'number' to set: {'A','2','3','4','5','6','7','8','9','T','J','Q','K'}

      • getStatus

        public int getStatus()
        Returns:
        the status 0 = face down, 1 = face up, 2 = matched

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus(int status)

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        "OO" if face down, "XX" if already matched, or the number and the suite or "ER" if there is some error
